Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectionRMI, ConnectionSocket

    public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class represent a connection between the client and the server and can be implemented in different ways The implementation depends by thecnology
    Author:
    Cysko7927

      void run()
      It is a thread that starts when the connection will insert in the list of Connections This thread sends a message to ask at client the credentials of the player (ColorId ,name) It receives the credentials and it saves them If there are problem sending message the connection will be no active

      • run

        public void run()
        It is a thread that starts when the connection will insert in the list of Connections This thread sends a message to ask at client the credentials of the player (ColorId ,name) It receives the credentials and it saves them If there are problem sending message the connection will be no active
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
